brand_identity.name: Vitta
brand_identity.mission: Simplify accounting for Indian SMBs with a modern, automated, and friendly interface.
brand_identity.archetype: Organic & Earthy (Trust/Growth) mixed with Soft Utility.

usage_rules.headings: Use Manrope. Weights: SemiBold (600) or Bold (700) for main titles. ExtraBold (800) for hero. Letter-spacing: tight (-0.02em).
usage_rules.body: Use DM Sans. Weights: Regular (400) for text, Medium (500) for labels. Relaxed line-height (1.6).

primary.description: Deep Emerald - The anchor. Use for primary buttons, active states, and strong headings.

secondary.description: Pale Sage/Mint White - Main background color to avoid sterile white.

accent.description: Electric Lime - High energy pop. Use for CTAs, success states, and highlights.

muted.description: Slate 100 - For card backgrounds and secondary areas.

dashboard.grid: Mode B: High Density Bento. grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4. Gap-4 or Gap-6.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Follow the 'Anti-AI' design philosophy. Avoid generic layouts. Use the specified color palette strictly. Do not use default Shadcn styles without customization.
instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'recharts' for charts (via Shadcn charts if available, or raw Recharts).
instructions_to_main_agent.styling: Use Tailwind CSS for all styling. Avoid inline styles. Use the 'cn' utility for class merging.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: For the dashboard, use Recharts. Style them to match the 'Deep Emerald' and 'Electric Lime' palette. Avoid default rainbow colors.
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Add 'framer-motion' for page transitions and micro-interactions. Use 'AnimatePresence' for conditional rendering.
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure all text meets APCA contrast standards. Use semantic HTML5 tags.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
